name: Possessed Room
description:
You are an exorcist.

Find and destroy heart of poltergeist.

WASD - Movement

LMB - Crucifix (exorcism)

RMB - Candle (light, stops enemies)

Made in Unity3d.

Autodesk Maya for 3d, Photoshop for 2d.

* There is no sound in compo version due to lack of time, sorry.
** 48 Hour Ludum Dare 37 Compo Entry "One Room"
